import React,{useEffect,useRef}from"react";import{IoHeartOutline}from"react-icons/io5";import ctaImage from"./assets/images/cta-banner.jpg";import"./assets/css/style.css";import{scrollTriggerAnimation,slideInLeft,slideInRight,floatingAnimation,continuousCardFloat,continuousCardPulse}from"../utils/gsapAnimations";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CTA=()=>{const ctaRef=useRef(null);const contentRef=useRef(null);const bannerRef=useRef(null);const buttonRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{// Animate CTA section on scroll
if(ctaRef.current){// Scroll-triggered animations
if(contentRef.current){scrollTriggerAnimation(contentRef.current,slideInLeft,"top 80%");}if(bannerRef.current){scrollTriggerAnimation(bannerRef.current,slideInRight,"top 80%");}// Continuous animations
setTimeout(()=>{if(bannerRef.current){floatingAnimation(bannerRef.current,3);}if(buttonRef.current){continuousCardFloat(buttonRef.current,0.5);continuousCardPulse(buttonRef.current,0.7);}},1500);}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"section cta",ref:ctaRef,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cta-content",ref:contentRef,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"h2 section-title",children:"324+ Trusted Global Partners"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"btn btn-outline",ref:buttonRef,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Become a Partner"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IoHeartOutline,{"aria-hidden":"true"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("figure",{className:"cta-banner",ref:bannerRef,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:ctaImage,width:"520",height:"228",loading:"lazy",alt:"Fox",className:"img-cover"})})]})});};export default CTA;
